xep.header:
Spam Reporting
This document specifies a mechanism by which users can report spam and other abuse to a server operator or other spam service.

section1.p: Many spam and abuse prevention techniques rely on users being able to report specific instances of abuse, or other users who are sending unwanted messages. &xep0191; allows users to block spammers, but does not provide a mechanism for them to report a reason for the block to the server operator. This specification extends the blocking command to optionally provide a reason.
This document introduces no additional security considerations above and beyond those defined in the documents on which it depends.
This document requires no interaction with &IANA;.
